name: CNPostalAddress
desc: An immutable representation of the postal address for a contact.

items.name: var street: String
items.desc: The street name in a postal address.

items.name: var city: String
items.desc: The city name in a postal address.

items.name: var state: String
items.desc: The state name in a postal address.

items.name: var postalCode: String
items.desc: The postal code in a postal address.

items.name: var country: String
items.desc: The country or region name in a postal address.

items.name: var isoCountryCode: String
items.desc: The ISO country code for the country or region in a postal address, using the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard.

items.name: var subAdministrativeArea: String
items.desc: The subadministrative area (such as a county or other region) in a postal address.

items.name: var subLocality: String
items.desc: Additional information associated with the location, typically defined at the city or town level, in a postal address.

items.name: class func localizedString(forKey: String) -> String
items.desc: Returns the localized name for the property associated with the specified key.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressStreetKey: String
items.desc: The street name of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressStateKey: String
items.desc: The state name of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressPostalCodeKey: String
items.desc: The postal code of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressCountryKey: String
items.desc: The country or region name of the address.

items.name: let CNPostalAddressISOCountryCodeKey: String
items.desc: The ISO country code of the address.
